yams.parser
Class Line

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--yams.parser.Line
public class Line
extends java.lang.Object

Models a line of code in a MIPS program that is input to the program. A line consists of a line number, an optional Label and an optional Instruction. The latter two are optional because the line could be blank by the user's decision

Constructor Summary
Line(int lineNumber, java.lang.String original)
          Creates a Line with no label or instruction
Line(int lineNumber, java.lang.String original, Instruction instruction)
          Creates a line with an instruction only
Line(int lineNumber, java.lang.String original, Label label)
          Creates a Line with a label only
Line(int lineNumber, java.lang.String original, Label label, Instruction instruction)
          creates a Line with a label AND an instruction.
